mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.title AS "title", a.cover_picture AS "coverPicture", a.content AS "content", a.brief AS "brief", a.uri AS "uri", a.type AS "type", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.creator AS "creator", a.updator AS "updator", a.deleted AS "deleted", a.wechat_id AS "wechatId"
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM t_wechat_material a
ORDER BY ${page.orderBy}
ORDER BY a.update_date DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_wechat_material( title, cover_picture, content, brief, uri, type, create_date, update_date, creator, updator, deleted, wechat_id ) VALUES ( #{title}, #{coverPicture}, #{content}, #{brief}, #{uri}, #{type}, now(), now(), #{creator}, #{updator}, 0, #{wechatId} )
mapper.update:
UPDATE t_wechat_material
title = #{title},
cover_picture = #{coverPicture},
content = #{content},
brief = #{brief},
uri = #{uri},
update_date = now()
